DOC.brief_summary: The device test ( fireflyTM ) stimulate common peroneal nerve cause foot twitch , show increase blood flow . The device also indicate treatment oedema . In study investigator intend ass use device adjunctive therapy people recover grade 1 2 ankle sprain .

Able understand Subject Information Sheet willing sign write Informed Consent Form . 5 . Able willing follow protocol requirement 1 . Has ankle sprain grade 3 2 . Evidence fracture 3 .
